snippet: Four years after the murder of an abortion provider in Wichita, a new women’s medical clinic has opened.
abstract: Editorial welcomes opening of new women's clinic in Kansas in same building that once housed clinic run by Dr George Tiller, who was murdered by anti-abortion extremist; contends clinic is tribute to perseverance and courage of those involved in the project, especially Julie Burkhart, former colleague of Tiller who directs Trust Women Foundation, which runs clinic.
lead_paragraph: Four years after the murder of an abortion provider in Wichita, a new women’s medical clinic has opened.

headline.seo: Courage on Abortion in Wichita, Kansas
